verses.verse: <S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> to his <S%H4899>anointed,<s%> to <S%H3566>Cyrus,<s%> <S%H834>whose<s%> <S%H3225>right<s%> <S%H3225>hand<s%> I have <S%H2388>held,<s%> to <S%H7286>subdue<s%> <S%H1471>nations<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> him; and I will <S%H6605>loose<s%> the <S%H4975>loins<s%> of <S%H4428>kings,<s%> to <S%H6605>open<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> him the two <S%H1817>leaved<s%> <S%H1817>gates;<s%> and the <S%H8179>gates<s%> shall not be <S%H5462>shut;<s%>

I will <S%H3212>go<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> you, and make the <S%H1921>crooked<s%> places <S%H3474>straight:<s%> I will <S%H7665>break<s%> in pieces the <S%H1817>gates<s%> of <S%H5154>brass,<s%> and <S%H1438>cut<s%> in sunder the <S%H1280>bars<s%> of <S%H1270>iron:<s%>

And I will <S%H5414>give<s%> you the <S%H214>treasures<s%> of <S%H2822>darkness,<s%> and <S%H4301>hidden<s%> <S%H4301>riches<s%> of <S%H4565>secret<s%> places, that you may <S%H3045>know<s%> that I, the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> which <S%H7121>call<s%> you by your <S%H8034>name,<s%> am the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

For <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> my <S%H5650>servant's<s%> <S%H4616>sake,<s%> and <S%H3478>Israel<s%> my <S%H972>elect,<s%> I have even <S%H7121>called<s%> you by your <S%H8034>name:<s%> I have <S%H3655>surnamed<s%> you, though you have not <S%H3045>known<s%> me.

I am the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and there is <S%H369>none<s%> <S%H5750>else,<s%> there is <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H2108>beside<s%> me: I <S%H247>girded<s%> you, though you have not <S%H3045>known<s%> me:

That they may <S%H3045>know<s%> from the <S%H4217>rising<s%> of the <S%H8121>sun,<s%> and from the <S%H4628>west,<s%> that there is <S%H657>none<s%> <S%H1107>beside<s%> me. I am the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and there is <S%H369>none<s%> <S%H5750>else.<s%>

I <S%H3335>form<s%> the <S%H216>light,<s%> and <S%H1254>create<s%> <S%H2822>darkness:<s%> I <S%H6213>make<s%> <S%H7965>peace,<s%> and <S%H1254>create<s%> <S%H7451>evil:<s%> I the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6213>do<s%> all <S%H428>these<s%> things.

<S%H7491>Drop<s%> down, you <S%H8064>heavens,<s%> from <S%H4605>above,<s%> and let the <S%H7834>skies<s%> <S%H5140>pour<s%> down <S%H6664>righteousness:<s%> let the <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H6605>open,<s%> and let them <S%H6509>bring<s%> <S%H6509>forth<s%> <S%H3468>salvation,<s%> and let <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> <S%H6779>spring<s%> up <S%H3162>together;<s%> I the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> have <S%H1254>created<s%> it.

<S%H1945>Woe<s%> to him that <S%H7378>strives<s%> with his <S%H3335>Maker!<s%> Let the <S%H2789>potsherd<s%> strive with the <S%H2789>potsherds<s%> of the <S%H127>earth.<s%> Shall the <S%H2563>clay<s%> <S%H559>say<s%> to him that <S%H3335>fashions<s%> it, <S%H4100>What<s%> <S%H6213>make<s%> you? or your <S%H6467>work,<s%> He has <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H3027>hands?<s%>

<S%H1945>Woe<s%> to him that <S%H559>said<s%> to his <S%H1>father,<s%> <S%H4100>What<s%> <S%H3205>beget<s%> you? or to the <S%H802>woman,<s%> <S%H4100>What<s%> have you <S%H2342>brought<s%> <S%H2342>forth?<s%>

<S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> the <S%H6918>Holy<s%> One of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and his <S%H3335>Maker,<s%> <S%H7592>Ask<s%> me of things to <S%H857>come<s%> <S%H5921>concerning<s%> my <S%H1121>sons,<s%> and <S%H5921>concerning<s%> the <S%H6467>work<s%> of my <S%H3027>hands<s%> <S%H6680>command<s%> you me.

I have <S%H6213>made<s%> the <S%H776>earth,<s%> and <S%H1254>created<s%> <S%H120>man<s%> on it: I, even my <S%H3027>hands,<s%> have <S%H5186>stretched<s%> out the <S%H8064>heavens,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> their <S%H6635>host<s%> have I <S%H6680>commanded.<s%>

I have <S%H5782>raised<s%> him up in <S%H6664>righteousness,<s%> and I will <S%H3474>direct<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H1870>ways:<s%> he shall <S%H1129>build<s%> my <S%H5892>city,<s%> and he shall let <S%H7971>go<s%> my <S%H1546>captives,<s%> not for <S%H4242>price<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H7810>reward,<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts.<s%>

<S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> The <S%H3018>labor<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> and <S%H5505>merchandise<s%> of <S%H3568>Ethiopia<s%> and of the <S%H5436>Sabeans,<s%> <S%H582>men<s%> of <S%H4060>stature,<s%> shall <S%H5674>come<s%> <S%H5674>over<s%> to you, and they shall be yours: they shall <S%H3212>come<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> you; in <S%H2131>chains<s%> they shall <S%H5674>come<s%> <S%H5674>over,<s%> and they shall <S%H7812>fall<s%> <S%H7812>down<s%> to you, they shall make <S%H6419>supplication<s%> to you, saying, <S%H389>Surely<s%> <S%H410>God<s%> is in you; and there is <S%H369>none<s%> <S%H5750>else,<s%> there is <S%H657>no<s%> <S%H430>God.<s%>
<S%H403>Truly<s%> you are a <S%H410>God<s%> that <S%H5641>hide<s%> yourself, O <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> the <S%H3467>Savior.<s%>

They shall be <S%H954>ashamed,<s%> and <S%H1571>also<s%> <S%H3637>confounded,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> of them: they shall <S%H1980>go<s%> to <S%H3639>confusion<s%> <S%H3162>together<s%> that are <S%H2796>makers<s%> of <S%H6736>idols.<s%>

But <S%H3478>Israel<s%> shall be <S%H3467>saved<s%> in the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> with an <S%H5769>everlasting<s%> <S%H8668>salvation:<s%> you shall not be <S%H954>ashamed<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H3637>confounded<s%> <S%H5769>world<s%> <S%H5769>without<s%> <S%H5703><s%> <S%H5704>end.<s%>

For <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> that <S%H1254>created<s%> the <S%H8064>heavens;<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H1931>himself<s%> that <S%H3335>formed<s%> the <S%H776>earth<s%> and <S%H6213>made<s%> it; he has <S%H3559>established<s%> it, he <S%H1254>created<s%> it not in <S%H8414>vain,<s%> he <S%H3335>formed<s%> it to be <S%H3427>inhabited:<s%> I am the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> and there is <S%H369>none<s%> <S%H5750>else.<s%>

I have not <S%H1696>spoken<s%> in <S%H5643>secret,<s%> in a <S%H2822>dark<s%> <S%H4725>place<s%> of the <S%H776>earth:<s%> I <S%H559>said<s%> not to the <S%H2233>seed<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> <S%H1245>Seek<s%> you me in <S%H8414>vain:<s%> I the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>speak<s%> <S%H6664>righteousness,<s%> I <S%H5046>declare<s%> things that are <S%H4339>right.<s%>

<S%H6908>Assemble<s%> yourselves and <S%H935>come;<s%> draw <S%H5066>near<s%> <S%H3162>together,<s%> you that are <S%H6412>escaped<s%> of the <S%H1471>nations:<s%> they have <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H3045>knowledge<s%> that <S%H5375>set<s%> up the <S%H6086>wood<s%> of their <S%H6459>graven<s%> image, and <S%H6419>pray<s%> to a <S%H410>god<s%> that <S%H3808>cannot<s%> <S%H3467>save.<s%>

<S%H5046>Tell<s%> you, and <S%H5066>bring<s%> them <S%H5066>near;<s%> <S%H637>yes,<s%> let them take <S%H3289>counsel<s%> <S%H3162>together:<s%> <S%H4310>who<s%> has <S%H8085>declared<s%> <S%H2063>this<s%> from <S%H6924>ancient<s%> time? who has <S%H5046>told<s%> it from that <S%H227>time?<s%> have not I the <S%H3068>LORD?<s%> and there is <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5750>else<s%> <S%H1107>beside<s%> me; a <S%H6662>just<s%> <S%H410>God<s%> and a <S%H3467>Savior;<s%> there is <S%H369>none<s%> <S%H2108>beside<s%> me.
<S%H6437>Look<s%> to me, and be you <S%H3467>saved,<s%> all the <S%H657>ends<s%> of the <S%H776>earth:<s%> for I am <S%H410>God,<s%> and there is <S%H369>none<s%> <S%H5750>else.<s%>

I have <S%H7650>sworn<s%> by myself, the <S%H1697>word<s%> is <S%H3318>gone<s%> out of my <S%H6310>mouth<s%> in <S%H6666>righteousness,<s%> and shall not <S%H7725>return,<s%> That to me <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H1290>knee<s%> shall <S%H3766>bow,<s%> <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H3956>tongue<s%> shall <S%H7650>swear.<s%>

<S%H389>Surely,<s%> shall one <S%H559>say,<s%> in the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> have I <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> and <S%H5797>strength:<s%> even to him shall men <S%H935>come;<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> that are <S%H2734>incensed<s%> against him shall be <S%H954>ashamed.<s%>
In the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H2233>seed<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> be <S%H6663>justified,<s%> and shall <S%H1984>glory.<s%>
